page.title: 06 EAST KENT PACKERS (E.K.P.)
page.content: EKP was built in 1964 to receive fruit from about 60 local farms like Brenley farm,Faversham.The farms infact own EKP. From January to April are the busiest months and 250 people are employed.Then to market the produce,only 120 people are employed in the summer months. EKP is responsible for packing and storing the farmer's produce.The fruit is stored for up to 12 months before being sold at London fruit markets. The main fruits packed are apples and pears.The varieties of apples packed are Cox,Spartan,Icla reds,Discovery and Golden Delicious.The main varieties of pears packed are Comice and Conference.
